overview: A  female reporter interviews John Holmes at his mansion as he looks back on his hottest sexual encounters.  Among his legendary exploits are a $1,000 trip to Miami as a gigolo to service a rich woman while her husband watches and takes photos, banging two curious neighbors while visiting a friend in Boston, humping the 19 year old wife of a film producer, and low-key lovemaking with a surprised massage therapist.  The reporter, however, resists his advances until their interview is finished.
title: Superstar
